misuses.misuse: CWE-330: Use of Insufficiently Random Values
misuses.description: The salt used in the PBEKeySpec is not properly generated, it is set to a static value which can be easily guessed by an attacker.
misuses.recommendation: Use a cryptographically secure pseudo-random number generator to generate the salt.

misuses.description: The password is hardcoded and stored in plaintext, which can be easily extracted from the code by an attacker.
misuses.recommendation: Use a secure password storage mechanism, such as a password vault or a secure password generator.

misuses.description: The iteration count used in the PBEKeySpec is low, which can be easily brute-forced by an attacker.
misuses.recommendation: Increase the iteration count to a more secure value, such as 100,000 or higher.
